name: The LES Apartment
description: Dear guests, Would you just like to live in the heart of the city that you would be eligible to go anywhere? If yes, you found the right place! It is a 1 bedroom apartment that can hold 3 people easily. The living room is spacious and there are enough places to seat groups. The apartment is facing the street, so, the house is not blocked by other buildings and the sun enters the living room. You can access to the rooftop where you have a beautiful view of Empire State Building on your right and Freedom Tower on your left. I will always be on contact if you need anything before and during your stay. Lower East Side is one of the most fascinating neighborhoods in New York City. Throughout it's history, LES had been an active and fun area where you can find basically everything you want and need. I can give a small history of the area once you arrive since I just wrote an article about it:) 2nd Avenue F station is 30 seconds walking distance. Delancey Street J M Z trains are few blocks aw

name: Apto semi mobiliado
description: Proximidade de comércio, serviços e transporte. Distante da poeira, bagunça e barulheira. Ambiente familiar e tranquilo. Lugar de passagem, sem internet, sem telefone, sem TV. Turismo se faz na rua e não dentro de casa. Casa é apenas o lugar de descanso para se repor as energias para o dia seguinte. A garagem só se alugar um carro. Apenas por celular, email ou (Hidden by Airbnb) . Fica a doze minutos da UERJ e quinze do Maracanã, andando a pé e devagar.
house_rules: Levar roupa de cama e banho.

name: Roof double bed private room
description: Near to underground metro station. Walking distance to seaside. 2 floors 1 entry. Husband, wife, girl and boy is living.

name: Keauhou Hale at Volcano
description: Just outside the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and minutes away from the active Halema'uma'u crater. Our cottage sits along the first fairway of the Volcano Golf CC with an open lanai looking at the majestic Mauna Loa and Mauna Kea in the distance. Comfortable and relaxing home away from home. Nearby Hawaii Volcanoes National Parks visitor center shops, hiking, if conditions allow for night time volcano viewing. Volcano Winery for wine tasting is less the a mile away. And of course golfing at the beautiful Volcano Golf and CC at our front yard! Punaluu's black sand beach is further south on Volcano hwy.

address.street: Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, HI, United States

The lines Bus, Train and Metro (L5 and L3) are located just a few meters away.  This apartment can lodge up to 5 persons in Spacious Rambla Cataluña s is located in the city center area, has 130 m ² and is in the 2nd floor in a building with lift . The lines Bus, Train and Metro (L5 and L3) are located just a few meters away.  This apartment can lodge up to 5 persons in 3 bedrooms: Bedroom 1: 1 single bed (1 people) Bedroom 2: 2 single beds (2 people) Bedroom 3: 1 single beds (1 person) Bedroom 4: 1 single beds (1 person) It has 2 complete bathrooms. The kitchen is equipped with wash machine, dish washer, microwave, coffee machine, oven, icebox and freezer and kettle. For your comfort, the apartment has TV, hairdryer, fans/ aircon, heating and Internet. We have 24 hours service, in case you have a problem or doubt during your stay, you can contact us any time. We

Note that is housed in a building where families live and need quiet and rest. reviews.comments: Very large house, cozy and bright. Celia is helpful and friendly, the house is not very far removed from the Metro to the bus stop, about 10 minutes walk.

Guests must respect our neighbors, do not draw any attention in the area. 3. Guests must take responsibility for the security of the apartment during their stay and always lock the door and windows properly when not in the apartment. 4.The apartment must be left in the same condition as it was found. Any breakage or damage caused by guest, must be paid by guest.  It is the guest's own responsibility to ensure their personal belongings are secured at all times, and we accept no liability for the loss. 6, Guest must have their own travel insurance. address.street: Sham Shui Po, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: it was a really bad experience. the room was really dirty, there were ants everywhere even in the water kettle there was an army of ants. the roof was leaking!! every corner of the room was just plain dirty. we didn't feel comfortable at all and when we messaged the host he ignored us. too bad! the location was nice for us but it's a 10 minute walk to the next mtr station. maybe you can take some bus but we didn't look it up because most of the time the prices of the mtr is the same and the metro is faster.
The host was quite responsive. He sent his staff several times to fix things. There was a small issue with Wi-Fi but he got it resolved almost immediately. Overall a good experience.

Feel at home, that's how i felt at Kwanbo's home. He is  very nice and helpful at check in and for any question I had. The room was clean, small but it's very hard to find a big room in Hong Kong. The apartment situation is very convenient, near shops, 7/11, restaurants, subway,... I recommend to stay there!
 I am an agent in Hongkong who help some travel to reservate apartment ,the above review is wrote by that apartment guest

這次的住房體驗不是特別好,房主聯繫我加了 (Hidden by Airbnb) 加載了視頻(視頻還無意中聽到一句粗口)指引我們去公寓貌似好溫馨｡結果跟了視頻走兜了很大的圈才到,夏天已經汗流浹背｡之後自己根據 (Hidden by Airbnb) 地圖去地鐵站才知道只要出門往深水埗市場直走就可以到｡不過也蠻遠,起碼走15分鐘吧｡再說說房間,整體上還能接受,但是房東的態度令我真的無語,很多次 (Hidden by Airbnb) 問他東西他都已讀不回｡這樣真的很沒禮貌｡還要給錯密碼,搞到等了很久才進房,3人房有一個以為是床的東西在廳就當床了,長度只有1米多點,就算小矮人睡都不夠位置啦,而且還沒有被子床單,之後叫佢拿上來只是一個麻袋,也不沒有打算幫我們鋪好｡然後熱水器竟然冇熱水是壞的,這一點我的小夥伴就不能忍受了,叫我一定要來給差評你們｡

Хозяин гостеприимен, обеспечил встречу. Квартира расположена удобно, недалеко от метро и основных транспортных магистралей. Квартира небольшая, тесновата для 4 человек. С удобствами в целом все в порядке, только плохо работала кухонная плита. Но с учетом цены это очень хороший вариант.

name: Barra da Tijuca beach house
description: Wonderful colonial style duplex house and a loft in the back, less than 5 minutes from the best part of the Barra da Tijuca beach. 24h security. Total area of 700 m2. Swimming pool, BBQ, games room, garden. Quiet location.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Nice room in Barcelona Center
description: Hi!  Cozy double bed room in amazing flat next to Passeig de Sant Joan and to metro stop Verdaguer. 3 streets to Sagrada Familia and 4 streets to Passeig de Gracia. Flat located in the center of the city.  View to Sagrada Familia and Torre Agbar. Nice flat in the central neighboorhood of Eixample. Ideal couple or 2 friends. Dreta de l'Eixample

name: Perto da praia de Copacabana
description: Quarto amplo para casal com banheiro privativo / banheira, closet, frigobar, apartamento de cobertura. Quadra da praia, próximo aos famosos bares de Copacabana. Prédio de luxo, 2 elevadores, porteiros 24 horas. Ideal para casal durante Olimpíadas. Falamos inglês, espanhol e português

name: Casa aconchegante com 3 quartos em cidade turística
description: Você se sentirá em casa! Casa espaçosa e aconchegante, no centro da cidade. Casa recém reformada, com três quartos, um banheiro, uma sala de jantar, uma cozinha e sala de TV. Ótima para quem gosta de passar um tempo em uma cidade calma e pacata.
